website_summaries.verdict: The minimalist design with reliable zippers is both effective and easy to use.
pros: Adjustable strap can be worn through belt loops or over the shoulder
Reliable zippers provide quick and easy access to treats
Front pocket adds additional storage space
cons: we suggest using the clip instead

customer_reviews.title: There's none better!  Simply the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: out of many we have tried this is THE only treatbag that won't spill the treats (even small kibbles) when you bend over or lie down. you can run, jump (and fall) without worrying about EVER spilling your treats. Dog will focus on you, instead of possible lost kibbles on the ground. It is also very EASY to put treats in the bag. grab a handful of treat in your hand, stick the hand in the bag, release and pull the hand out. Simple. no need to close the bag, as it self seals itself. bought more so we'd have them for the future in case the product disappears from market.
customer_reviews.author: ao

customer_reviews.title: Great training gear
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best training belts available. A wide mouth, so treats are easy to access. Timing is everything when I'm clicker training with my pups...I can't click the trick and then not reward for 20 seconds while I'm fumbling around with a lesser treat bag. It's pretty easy to clean, but I recommend placing a baggie inside the pouch to help last longer between washes. Even with the wide opening, I don't have a problem with treats falling out. The strap is a snug fit on me, but it DOES fit and I'm a large lady.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Pros- well made, getting a treat out is 100% easy!, also bending over and not having them spill out works very well too, allows you to have keys & phone in separate pocket. IMO this is the best treat bag on the market today. The company is very responsive as well, helped with a product issue ASAP. Cons- the interior treat space is pretty large. If your a professional trainer you may not need to refill it multiple times a day, but for the typical dog owner it's too large in there.
customer_reviews.author: RappsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: BEST Treat Pouch Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This pouch was recommended to me by a local Trainer and Pet Sitter who has tried them all. She is right! This is amazing. the treats are easily accessible from he zip portion outside. The inside holds my phone, baggies, paper towels and there is room for much more. I highly recommend this if you love your dogs as much as I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: C. Michael

customer_reviews.title: I like the neoprene closure
customer_reviews.text: I like the neoprene closure. Just slip hand right through the top. I keep treats in original sealable bags inside pouch..So no worry for drying out. Nothing spills when you bend..And you don't have to continuously open and close. I have a 40+ inch waist, and the belt with pouch accommodates me fine. Front zipper pouch large enough for a leash or 2 tennis balls. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for everyday training
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these from when I went to their trainer course. I enjoy the easy of access on the top of the pouch. I wish the belt clip on the back of the pouch was a little sturdier. Also would be nice to make an inside hardened plastic oval insert to put in it.
customer_reviews.author: JEG

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is perfect for Agility! It is extremely easy to access the treats. However, they do not fall out, even when running or bending over.
customer_reviews.author: jason mcwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Testing
customer_reviews.text: I use bait bags all the time. I am in the process of testing this one. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: We always love products by Triple Crown. This puts a bit different shape to the typical treat pouch. Holds peripherals; keeps things from falling out but treats are accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Trainer

customer_reviews.title: good training pouch, needs better poop bag holder
customer_reviews.text: it's convenient to get your hand into quickly while you're training thanks to the opening, but the only good place to keep poop bags requires storing them in the zipper pouch
customer_reviews.author: parker70

customer_reviews.title: Great treat bag
customer_reviews.text: I am a dog trainer that uses my treat pouches every day. This is the one bag that holds up to every day use :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter uses this product to help train her dogs. It has worked well for her, thus far. She's very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: April Renn/AprilR

customer_reviews.title: ... star review only because the belt clip breaks so easily. I have 5 of these pouches because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Im not giving this a 5 star review only because the belt clip breaks so easily. I have 5 of these pouches because the belt clip. Other than that, great treat pouch!
customer_reviews.author: Megs

customer_reviews.title: Best treat bag out there
customer_reviews.text: Treats dont fall out and you dont have to continue to zip/unzip
customer_reviews.author: Penny L.

customer_reviews.title: Ok - some drawbacks but using it as my primary training pouch
customer_reviews.text: Am using it. Small cut-up treats are sometimes hard to get out - the biggest drawback are the seams at the bottom of the treat pocket. Am using a seamless treat pouch inside the treat pocket to make quick and reliable treat delivery possible. Side pocket is handy but a bit small - for example will not hold large smartphones.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce K.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect to reach in and get the little treats since it does not have zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Jadie

customer_reviews.title: Great treat pouch
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of the Triple Crown treat pouch and definitely like it better than any others I have seen. However, in a perfect world I wish it were 1 inch wider and maybe 1 inch more shallow - that would work better for my large man hands. Otherwise no complaints or suggestions. YES, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product easy to use and reliable
customer_reviews.text: There is not better treat pouch, easy to use dependable with less mess. Easy access to treats
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Best treat pouch I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This pouch has been the best I have used so far. Treats are easily accessible and quick with no spills. Also fits nicely with the waist strap.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Farlam

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag it keeps all your treats in bag even when you bend over. It’s easy to clean and the out side pocket keeps phone in safe place.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest F. Rossano Jr.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far it looks like it will work good, seems to be built well
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: Great treat bag!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get to the treats and has extra pouch for keys and phone.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Preble

product_meta.title: Triple Crown Pro Training Neoprene Treat Toy Pouch Adjustable Strap for Pet Dogs
product_meta.description: Starmark Dog Pro Training Treat Pouch Black/Gray 6.75"" x 10.5"" x 3.5"" Treats don t fall out and rounded bottom prevents treats from hiding. Zippered front pocket, belt clip, adjustable belt, and side webbing for clicker, keys, etc. FEATURES: Neoprene opening for quick treat access Zipper front pocket Adjustable belt Manufacture Name: StarMark
